definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: A gravimetric method for measuring crystal water in uranium tetrafluoride is reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文敘述了測定四氟化鈾結晶水的重量分析方法。

sentences.english: This product lossed part of crystalline water. It is a white crystalline power.
sentences.chinese: 本品已失去部分結晶水，爲白色結晶興粉末。

sentences.english: Water of crystallization of barium chloride was determined more rapidly more simply and more accurately by the application of microwave heating technigue.
sentences.chinese: 在微波輻射下準確測定了氯化鋇中結晶水的含量。

sentences.english: While controlling the crystal water content, the ignition ratio would be cut down.
sentences.chinese: 但控制硝酸鍶中結晶水含量，使底火發火率降低。

sentences.english: The number of crystal water was obtained with TG curve.
sentences.chinese: 用熱重曲線求出了配合物所含的結晶水數目。
